values.value: Updates an existing record in Salesforce

✏️ UpdateRecord Action

This action updates an existing record in Salesforce.

Backend Configuration

No specific backend configuration required. The object type is automatically detected from the recordId.

Parameters (AI will provide)

  • recordId (String): The 18-character Salesforce ID of the record to update (required)
  • recordData (Object): SObject field values to update (required)
  • Add field properties inside recordData (e.g., recordData.Status, recordData.Priority)

Example

To update a Case: {"recordId": "500...", "recordData": {"Priority": "High", "Status": "Closed"}}
